TOSCITEX(6D)                                       TOSCITEX(6D)





NAME
       toscitex - Convert IRIS images into Scitex CT2T images

SYNOPSIS
       toscitex imagefiles

DESCRIPTION
       toscitex  converts a bunch of IRIS image files into Sci-
       tex CT2T images on the cartridge tape.



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004              TOSCITEX(6D)
